articles.title: Drinking Coffee Linked With Lower Death Risk – Even if You Take It Sweetened With Sugar - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Coffee is one of the most consumed beverages in the United States and the world. In fact, according to the National Coffee Association, 66% of Americans drink coffee each day, making it the most popular beverage — even more than tap water! With all this consu…
articles.content:
According to a new study, moderate coffee drinkers were less likely to die than non-coffee drinkers. This held true even for people that sweeten their coffee with sugar.

articles.title: Indian-American girl wins 2022 Scripps National Spelling Bee after tiebreaker - Hindustan Times
